vue-scaff

A UNIQUE VUE SCAFFOLDING

START

TRUSTWORTHY

Out-of-the-box support for Babel, ESLint, PostCSS and Lighting Fast HMR.

APPROACHABLE

Configure once, completely abandon the annoying import!

VERSATILE

Seamlessly switch between vue-cli and vite, i think you will understand :D

Tips

  • vue-scaff requires Node.js >= 12.22.0
  • if using typescript, please update Node.js to ^12.22.0 or ^14.17.0 or >= 16.0.0

# get vue-scaff

Please check if your network supports access to GitHub first. ping github.com

yarn create vue-scaff project-name
1
npm create vue-scaff project-name
1
npx create-vue-scaff project-name
1
